title: Israel: the 20th century miracle
creator_credit: Bob Bailey Studios and R and H Media Productions
brief_description: Illustrates how the tiny country of Israel has developed the most efficient and advanced techniques of food production in the world, under the most adverse conditions. Also highlights kibbutz and desert lifestyles.
creator_credit_for_label: Bob Bailey Studios and R and H Media Productions
